rafflesystem.close.error.closed.message: There is no raffle in progress.

rafflesystem.close.success.message: The raffle is now closed! No more entries will be counted. Use "!raffle draw" to pick a winner!

rafflesystem.common.following.message: You need to be following the channel

rafflesystem.common.timer.message: The raffle will close in $1 minutes.

rafflesystem.enter.following.message: You need to be following to enter this raffle.

rafflesystem.enter.points.message: You don't have enough $1 to enter this raffle.

rafflesystem.enter.subscriber.message: You need to be subscribed to enter this raffle.

rafflesystem.enter.time.message: You have not been in the channel long enough to enter this raffle.

rafflesystem.message.set.message: Raffle message has been set to: "$1".

rafflesystem.open.message: A raffle is now opened! Type $1 to enter$2! $3

rafflesystem.open.error.opened.message: A raffle is currently in progress.

rafflesystem.open.keyword-exists.message: Keyword cannot be an existing command: $1

rafflesystem.open.points.message: A raffle is now opened! Type $1 to enter. Entering cost $2! $3

rafflesystem.open.time.message: A raffle is now opened! Type $1 to enter. You need to have been in chat for $2 minutes $3 to enter. $4

rafflesystem.open.usage.message: Usage: !raffle open [-usetime minutes | -usepoints entry_fee] [keyword] [close timer minutes] [-followers | -subscribers]. [keyword] required.

rafflesystem.raffle.repick.toggle1.message: Raffle winners will no longer be repicked.

rafflesystem.raffle.repick.toggle2.message: Raffle winners will now be able to get repicked.

rafflesystem.repick.error.message: There are no more users in the raffle list.

rafflesystem.results.message: A raffle is still opened! Keyword: $1 - Total entries: $2

rafflesystem.timer.set.message: Raffle message timer has been set to $1 minutes.

rafflesystem.usage.message: Usage: !raffle [open / close / draw / results / subscriberbonus/ regularbonus / whisperwinner]

rafflesystem.whisper.winner.message: You won the raffle in channel $1!

rafflesystem.winner.message: The winner of this raffle is $1! $2

rafflesystem.winner.404.message: Could not pick a winner. No one entered this raffle.
